Summoner Brynthea
How do you do, apprenticeship Summoner? My name is Brynthea, a Summoner like you. That thing over there is my lovely servant, silhouette Tilfo.
I suppose you came here to challenge me? Here, this is my Arcana Card... It is a masterpiece made by ordering a Dwarf slave. Ain't that a beauty? I shall give you this card if you win. ...So, I guess you are about to say something now?
